headline: Campbell’s downgrades 2025 sales and profit guidance
summary: The company now projects full-year net sales growth of 6% to 8%, down from the initial 9% to 11% forecast.

headline: The Campbell`s Co (CPB) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Navigating Challenges with Strategic ...
summary: Despite a 9% net sales growth driven by the Sovos acquisition, The Campbell`s Co (CPB) faces hurdles in the snacking sector, prompting revised guidance and strategic focus on core brands.
